    com.guardtime.ksi
    KSI API interface.

    This package contains classes and interfaces used to create block signatures

    Provides implementation to decode and encode in-memory publications files.

    KSI TCP client for signing.

    This package contains classes and interfaces used to decode and encode TLV elements.
    com.guardtime.ksi.tree
    This package contains classes and interfaces used to build a hash tree.

    Trust provider classes.
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature
    Provides interfaces to decode and encode KSI signatures

    Provides classes to decode and encode in-memory KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier
    Provides classes and interfaces to verify KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.rules
    Contains KSI signature verification rules

      Loads the KeyStore from the file system and sets the KeyStore to be used as trust store to verify the certificate that was used to sign the publications file.

      Convenience method to verify KSI signature.Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method.

      Convenience method to verify KSI signature.Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method.

      Convenience method to verify KSI signature.Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method.

      This method is used to verify the keyless signature.
